Name: Water Girls
About the game: Water Girls is a fun visual novel that follows Jasmin as she has a day out with two female friends. What wild fun will they have together as you get to choose what water activity to enjoy, visit the beach or the water park either way could lead to some crazy fun and sexy shinanigans between the three girls as your choices determine what happens during the game in this fun and frivolous adventure. Game Features: - Three Character in swimsuits - A fun story with multiple choices - Alternate endings based on your decisions - A series of amazing illustrations - Yuri/Lesbian Storyline (LGBTQ+)
